adblock.title: Oops! Looks like you're using an ad blocker
adblock.message: We get it — ads can be annoying. But here's the thing: every tool on Tuttilo is 100% free, no accounts, no limits, no tricks. The ads are the only way we keep the lights on and the servers humming.

adblock.footnote: After disabling, click the button to reload the page.

compress-pdf.name: Compress PDF
compress-pdf.description: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining quality

seo.title: Free Online PDF Compressor
seo.content: Compress PDF files to reduce their size while preserving quality. Perfect for email attachments and uploads. Works entirely in your browser — no data is sent to any server.
seo.description: Compress PDF files online for free. Reduce file size by up to 80% while preserving quality. No upload needed — works entirely in your browser.

faq.q1: How much can the file size be reduced?
faq.a1: Compression results vary depending on the PDF content. Documents with many images typically see the largest reductions, often 50-80% smaller. Text-heavy PDFs may see smaller reductions.
faq.q2: Does compression reduce the quality of my PDF?
faq.a2: The tool uses smart compression that targets embedded images while preserving text sharpness. The result is visually very close to the original in most cases.
faq.a3: Password-protected PDFs need to be unlocked first. Use our Unlock PDF tool to remove the protection, then compress the file.

unlock-pdf.name: Unlock PDF
unlock-pdf.description: Remove password protection from PDF files

seo.title: Free Online PDF Unlocker
seo.content: Remove password protection from PDF files directly in your browser. Unlock PDFs to enable editing, printing, and copying. Free, private, no upload needed.
seo.description: Remove password protection from PDF files instantly. Free online PDF unlocker that works in your browser with no file uploads required.

faq.q1: What types of PDF protection can be removed?
faq.a1: The tool can remove both user passwords (required to open the PDF) and owner passwords (that restrict editing, printing, or copying). You must know the password to unlock the file.
faq.a2: Yes, as long as you have the right to access the PDF. This tool is designed for users who know the password but want to remove it for convenience. Never use it on files you do not own.
faq.q3: Will the PDF content be changed?
faq.a3: No. The tool only removes the password protection. All content, formatting, images, and metadata remain exactly the same.

seo.description: Check color contrast ratios for WCAG 2.1 compliance. Test foreground and background colors against AA and AAA accessibility standards. Free online tool.
seo.content: Our WCAG Contrast Checker helps you verify that your text colors meet accessibility standards. Enter foreground and background colors to instantly see the contrast ratio and whether your combination passes WCAG 2.1 Level AA and AAA requirements for both normal and large text.
seo.p2: Accessibility is essential for inclusive web design. WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) defines minimum contrast ratios to ensure text is readable by people with visual impairments. Level AA requires 4.5:1 for normal text and 3:1 for large text, while Level AAA requires 7:1 and 4.5:1 respectively.
seo.p3: The tool provides a live preview showing exactly how your text will look against the background. Clear pass/fail badges for each WCAG level make it easy to assess your color choices at a glance.

faq.a1: WCAG contrast ratio measures the relative luminance between foreground and background colors, on a scale from 1:1 (no contrast) to 21:1 (maximum contrast, black on white). Higher ratios mean better readability.
faq.q2: What are the WCAG AA and AAA requirements?
faq.a2: WCAG AA requires a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for normal text and 3:1 for large text (18px+ bold or 24px+). WCAG AAA is stricter, requiring 7:1 for normal text and 4.5:1 for large text.
faq.q3: Why does color contrast matter for accessibility?
faq.a3: Many people have visual impairments including low vision, color blindness, or age-related vision loss. Sufficient contrast ensures that text content is readable by the widest possible audience, which is both a usability best practice and often a legal requirement.
faq.q4: How do I fix a failing contrast ratio?
faq.a4: Make the foreground darker or the background lighter (or vice versa). You can use our tool to experiment with different color combinations until you find one that passes the required WCAG level while maintaining your design aesthetics.
faq.q5: Does this tool support alpha transparency?
faq.a5: The current version works with opaque (solid) HEX colors. For transparent colors, the effective contrast depends on underlying layers. Test with the final rendered color for accurate results.

faq.a3: Public keys use SPKI format, private keys use PKCS#8 format, both encoded as PEM (Base64 with headers). Compatible with OpenSSL and most tools.
faq.q4: Can I use these keys for SSH?
faq.a4: The generated keys are in PKCS#8/SPKI PEM format. You may need to convert them to OpenSSH format using ssh-keygen for SSH use.
faq.a5: Larger key sizes require finding larger prime numbers, which is computationally intensive. 4096-bit keys may take a few seconds to generate.

ui.warning: Private keys are generated locally and never leave your browser. Store them securely.

pbkdf2-generator.name: PBKDF2 Key Derivation
pbkdf2-generator.description: Derive cryptographic keys from passwords using PBKDF2 with configurable parameters.
pbkdf2-generator.keywords: pbkdf2, key derivation, password hash, pbkdf2 generator, password based key

seo.title: PBKDF2 Generator — Password Key Derivation Online
seo.description: Derive cryptographic keys from passwords using PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2). Configurable hash, iterations, salt, and key length.
seo.content: PBKDF2 Generator derives cryptographic keys from passwords using the PBKDF2 algorithm with configurable SHA hash, iteration count, salt, and output length.
seo.p2: PBKDF2 applies a pseudorandom function (HMAC) to the input password along with a salt, repeating the process many times to produce a derived key.
seo.p3: Higher iteration counts increase computation time, making brute-force attacks more expensive. 100,000+ iterations is recommended for password storage.
seo.p4: All key derivation happens locally in your browser using the Web Crypto API. Your password and salt never leave your device.

faq.a1: PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2) is a standard algorithm (RFC 2898) that converts a password into a cryptographic key by applying a hash function many times with a salt.
faq.q2: How many iterations should I use?
faq.a2: OWASP recommends at least 600,000 iterations for SHA-256 as of 2023. Higher values are more secure but slower. 100,000 is a reasonable minimum.
faq.a3: A salt is random data added to the password before hashing. It ensures that identical passwords produce different derived keys, preventing rainbow table attacks.
faq.a4: All are password hashing algorithms. Argon2 is newest and recommended. bcrypt is well-established. PBKDF2 is the most widely supported and available natively in browsers.
faq.q5: Is this secure for password storage?
faq.a5: PBKDF2 with high iteration count and a unique salt per password is suitable for password storage, though Argon2id is now preferred for new applications.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how Tuttilo protects your privacy. All file processing happens locally in your browser — we never upload, store, or access your files on any server.
privacy.intro: At Tuttilo, your privacy is our top priority. All file processing happens entirely in your browser — your files are never uploaded to our servers.

noDataCollection.title: We Don't Collect Your Files
noDataCollection.content: Tuttilo is a browser-based tool suite. When you process a PDF, image, video, or any other file, the processing happens locally on your device using JavaScript and WebAssembly. No file data is ever sent to our servers or any third party.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.content: We may use anonymous analytics (such as page views and tool usage counts) to improve our service. This data contains no personally identifiable information and cannot be linked to any individual user.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Tuttilo uses only essential cookies for basic functionality such as language preference and theme selection. We do not use tracking cookies or advertising cookies.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our website may load resources from content delivery networks (CDNs) for fonts and JavaScript libraries. These services may receive your IP address as part of standard web requests. We do not share any personal data or file content with third parties.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Since we do not collect or store your files, there is no file data to retain. Any preferences stored in your browser (such as language or theme) remain on your device and can be cleared at any time through your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR and other privacy regulations, you have the right to access, correct, or delete any personal data. Since Tuttilo does not collect personal data or files, these rights are inherently respected by our architecture.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at the address listed on our Contact page.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.content: We display non-invasive advertisements on our tool pages through third-party ad networks (such as Ezoic and Google AdSense). These ads help us keep all tools completely free. Ad networks may use cookies and similar technologies to serve relevant ads based on your browsing activity. You can manage your cookie preferences through the cookie consent banner. We do not sell your personal data to advertisers. Ad revenue is our primary way to sustain this free service.

terms.title: Terms of Service

pdf-to-word.title: Convert PDF to Word Online Free
pdf-to-word.description: Convert PDF files to editable Word documents (.docx) for free. No signup required. All processing happens in your browser — your files stay private.
pdf-to-word.content: Converting PDF to Word is one of the most common document tasks. Whether you need to edit a contract, update a report, or extract text from a scanned document, our free PDF to Word converter handles it all. The tool preserves formatting, tables, and images while creating an editable .docx file. Unlike other converters, everything runs in your browser — no file uploads to external servers, ensuring complete privacy.
pdf-to-word.howToTitle: How to Convert PDF to Word
pdf-to-word.readyTitle: Ready to Convert PDF to Word?
pdf-to-word.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
pdf-to-word.step2: The converter automatically extracts text and formatting

faq.q1: Will the formatting be preserved when converting PDF to Word?
faq.a1: Yes, our converter preserves text formatting, tables, lists, and images. Complex layouts with multiple columns may require minor adjustments in Word.
faq.q2: Can I convert scanned PDFs to editable Word documents?
faq.a2: Yes, our tool includes OCR (Optical Character Recognition) that can extract text from scanned PDFs and image-based documents, making them fully editable in Word.
faq.q3: Is there a file size limit for PDF to Word conversion?
faq.a3: You can convert PDFs up to 50MB for free. Since processing happens in your browser, larger files may take longer depending on your device's performance.

word-to-pdf.title: Convert Word to PDF Online Free
word-to-pdf.description: Convert Word documents (.doc, .docx) to PDF format for free. Preserve formatting perfectly. No signup, no uploads — everything stays in your browser.
word-to-pdf.content: Need to share a Word document that looks the same on every device? Converting Word to PDF ensures your formatting, fonts, and layout remain intact regardless of the recipient's software. Our free converter transforms .doc and .docx files into professional PDF documents instantly. The conversion preserves headers, footers, page numbers, tables, and embedded images with pixel-perfect accuracy.
word-to-pdf.howToTitle: How to Convert Word to PDF
word-to-pdf.readyTitle: Ready to Convert Word to PDF?
word-to-pdf.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
word-to-pdf.step2: The converter preserves all formatting and layout

faq.q1: Will my Word document look the same as PDF?
faq.a1: Yes, the conversion preserves fonts, spacing, tables, images, and page layout. The PDF will look identical to your original Word document on any device.
faq.q2: Can I convert password-protected Word files to PDF?
faq.a2: You'll need to remove the password protection from the Word file first. Once unprotected, you can convert it to PDF normally.
faq.q3: Does converting Word to PDF reduce file size?
faq.a3: PDF files are often smaller than Word documents because PDF uses efficient compression for text and images. Expect a 10-30% reduction in file size.

pdf-to-excel.title: Convert PDF to Excel Online Free
pdf-to-excel.description: Extract tables from PDF files into editable Excel spreadsheets (.xlsx) for free. No signup required. Browser-based processing for complete privacy.
pdf-to-excel.content: Extracting data from PDF tables into Excel is essential for financial analysis, data processing, and reporting. Our PDF to Excel converter intelligently detects tables in your PDF and converts them into properly structured Excel spreadsheets. Each table becomes a clean, editable worksheet with correct cell alignment and data types. Perfect for invoices, financial statements, and data reports.
pdf-to-excel.howToTitle: How to Convert PDF to Excel
pdf-to-excel.readyTitle: Ready to Convert PDF to Excel?
pdf-to-excel.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
pdf-to-excel.step2: Our tool detects and extracts table data automatically

faq.q1: Can it extract multiple tables from one PDF?
faq.a1: Yes, the converter detects all tables in your PDF and places each one in a separate worksheet within the Excel file, maintaining the original structure.
faq.q2: Will formulas be preserved in the conversion?
faq.a2: PDFs don't contain formulas — only displayed values. The converter extracts the visible numbers and text. You'll need to recreate any formulas in Excel.
faq.q3: How accurate is the table detection?
faq.a3: Our tool uses advanced algorithms to detect table boundaries, merged cells, and column alignment. Accuracy is typically 95%+ for well-formatted PDF tables.

pdf-to-powerpoint.title: Convert PDF to PowerPoint Online Free
pdf-to-powerpoint.description: Convert PDF presentations to editable PowerPoint (.pptx) slides for free. Preserve layout and design. No signup, browser-based processing.
pdf-to-powerpoint.content: Transform PDF presentations back into editable PowerPoint slides with our free converter. Each PDF page becomes a separate slide, preserving the original layout, text positioning, and visual design. Ideal for editing presentations you received as PDF, updating old slide decks, or repurposing content. The converter maintains high visual fidelity while making every element editable in PowerPoint.
pdf-to-powerpoint.howToTitle: How to Convert PDF to PowerPoint
pdf-to-powerpoint.readyTitle: Ready to Convert PDF to PowerPoint?
pdf-to-powerpoint.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
pdf-to-powerpoint.step2: Each page is converted to an editable slide

faq.q1: Will animations and transitions be preserved?
faq.a1: PDFs don't contain animation data, so those won't transfer. However, all visual elements including text, images, shapes, and layout are faithfully reproduced on each slide.
faq.q2: Can I edit text after converting PDF to PowerPoint?
faq.a2: Yes, text elements are converted as editable text boxes in PowerPoint. You can modify fonts, colors, sizes, and content freely.
faq.q3: What's the maximum number of slides?
faq.a3: There's no slide limit. The converter handles PDFs of any length, creating one PowerPoint slide per PDF page.

images-to-pdf.title: Convert Images to PDF Online Free
images-to-pdf.description: Combine JPG, PNG, and other images into a single PDF document for free. Arrange pages, adjust orientation. No signup required.
images-to-pdf.content: Create professional PDF documents from your images with our free converter. Whether you're digitizing receipts, creating a photo portfolio, or compiling scanned documents, simply upload your images and arrange them in the desired order. The tool supports JPG, PNG, WebP, and other common formats. You can adjust page orientation, add multiple images per page, and control the output quality.
images-to-pdf.howToTitle: How to Convert Images to PDF
images-to-pdf.readyTitle: Ready to Convert Images to PDF?
images-to-pdf.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
images-to-pdf.step1: Upload one or more images (JPG, PNG, WebP)
images-to-pdf.step2: Arrange the order and adjust settings

faq.q1: How many images can I combine into one PDF?
faq.a1: There's no limit on the number of images. You can combine hundreds of images into a single PDF. Larger batches may take longer to process.
faq.q2: Will image quality be reduced in the PDF?
faq.a2: By default, images are embedded at high quality (92% JPEG). You can adjust the compression level to balance between file size and image quality.
faq.q3: Can I set different orientations for different pages?
faq.a3: The tool automatically detects whether each image is landscape or portrait and adjusts the PDF page orientation accordingly.

html-to-pdf.title: Convert HTML to PDF Online Free
html-to-pdf.description: Convert any webpage or HTML code to a professional PDF document for free. Preserve styles and layout. Browser-based, no server upload needed.
html-to-pdf.content: Convert web pages and HTML content into clean, printable PDF documents. Our HTML to PDF converter renders your HTML with full CSS support, producing pixel-perfect PDF output. Perfect for saving web articles, generating reports from HTML templates, or creating printable versions of online content. The converter handles responsive layouts, web fonts, images, and complex CSS styling.
html-to-pdf.howToTitle: How to Convert HTML to PDF
html-to-pdf.readyTitle: Ready to Convert HTML to PDF?
html-to-pdf.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
html-to-pdf.step1: Paste your HTML code or enter a URL

faq.q1: Does it support CSS styles and external stylesheets?
faq.a1: Yes, the converter fully supports inline CSS, embedded stylesheets, and common CSS properties including flexbox, grid, fonts, colors, and responsive layouts.
faq.q2: Can I convert a live webpage URL to PDF?
faq.a2: Yes, enter any public URL and the converter will fetch and render the page as a PDF. Some pages with dynamic JavaScript content may not render completely.
faq.q3: Will images from the webpage be included?
faq.a3: Yes, all images referenced in the HTML are included in the PDF output, maintaining their original size and positioning.

png-to-jpg.title: Convert PNG to JPG Online Free
png-to-jpg.description: Convert PNG images to JPG format for free. Reduce file size while maintaining quality. No signup, no upload — processed in your browser.
png-to-jpg.content: PNG to JPG conversion is ideal when you need smaller file sizes for web publishing, email attachments, or social media. While PNG excels at graphics with transparency and text, JPG uses lossy compression that typically reduces file size by 60-80%. Our converter lets you control the quality level, finding the perfect balance between file size and visual fidelity. Batch conversion is supported for multiple files.
png-to-jpg.howToTitle: How to Convert PNG to JPG
png-to-jpg.readyTitle: Ready to Convert PNG to JPG?
png-to-jpg.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.

faq.q1: Will I lose quality converting PNG to JPG?
faq.a1: JPG uses lossy compression, so there's a slight quality reduction. At 92% quality (our default), the difference is imperceptible to the human eye while file sizes drop significantly.
faq.q2: What happens to transparent areas in PNG?
faq.a2: JPG doesn't support transparency. Transparent areas in your PNG will be filled with a white background in the converted JPG file.
faq.q3: Can I convert multiple PNGs to JPG at once?
faq.a3: Yes, our batch converter handles multiple files simultaneously. Upload all your PNGs and download the converted JPGs in one go.

jpg-to-png.title: Convert JPG to PNG Online Free
jpg-to-png.description: Convert JPG images to PNG format for free. Get lossless quality with transparency support. No signup required, browser-based processing.
jpg-to-png.content: Converting JPG to PNG gives you lossless image quality and transparency support. PNG is the preferred format for graphics, logos, screenshots, and any image where crisp edges and text clarity matter. Unlike JPG, PNG uses lossless compression — your converted image will have no compression artifacts. This makes it ideal for professional graphics, web design assets, and images that will undergo further editing.
jpg-to-png.howToTitle: How to Convert JPG to PNG
jpg-to-png.readyTitle: Ready to Convert JPG to PNG?
jpg-to-png.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
jpg-to-png.step2: The converter processes with lossless PNG compression

faq.q1: Will converting JPG to PNG improve image quality?
faq.a1: Converting won't restore quality lost during original JPG compression. However, the PNG format prevents any further quality loss in future edits or saves.
faq.q2: Why is my PNG file larger than the original JPG?
faq.a2: PNG uses lossless compression, which preserves every pixel perfectly but results in larger file sizes. This is normal — you're trading size for quality.
faq.q3: Can I add transparency after converting to PNG?
faq.a3: Yes, once converted to PNG you can edit the image in any graphics editor to add transparency. The PNG format fully supports alpha channel transparency.

webp-to-jpg.title: Convert WebP to JPG Online Free
webp-to-jpg.description: Convert WebP images to JPG format for free. Ensure compatibility with all devices and software. No signup, instant browser-based conversion.
webp-to-jpg.content: WebP is a modern image format developed by Google, but not all software and devices support it natively. Converting WebP to JPG ensures universal compatibility — JPG is supported by every image viewer, email client, social media platform, and operating system. Our converter maintains high visual quality during the conversion, with adjustable quality settings to control file size.
webp-to-jpg.howToTitle: How to Convert WebP to JPG
webp-to-jpg.readyTitle: Ready to Convert WebP to JPG?
webp-to-jpg.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.

faq.a1: While WebP offers better compression, JPG has universal compatibility. Some email clients, older software, and social platforms may not display WebP images correctly.
faq.q2: Is there quality loss when converting WebP to JPG?
faq.a2: There's minimal quality loss at high quality settings (90%+). Both formats use similar compression techniques, so the visual difference is negligible.
faq.q3: Can I batch convert multiple WebP files?
faq.a3: Yes, upload multiple WebP files and convert them all to JPG simultaneously. Each file is processed independently with your chosen quality settings.

webp-to-png.title: Convert WebP to PNG Online Free
webp-to-png.description: Convert WebP images to PNG format for free. Get lossless quality output. No signup, no file uploads — everything processed in your browser.
webp-to-png.content: Convert WebP images to PNG for lossless quality and universal compatibility. PNG is ideal when you need to preserve every pixel perfectly — for graphics, screenshots, or images with text. While WebP offers better compression, PNG is more widely supported in image editing software and older systems. Our converter processes everything locally in your browser, ensuring your images remain private.
webp-to-png.howToTitle: How to Convert WebP to PNG
webp-to-png.readyTitle: Ready to Convert WebP to PNG?
webp-to-png.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
webp-to-png.step2: The converter produces lossless PNG output

faq.a1: Yes, if your WebP image has transparency (alpha channel), it will be perfectly preserved in the PNG output. PNG fully supports transparency.
faq.q2: Why choose PNG over JPG for the output?
faq.a2: Choose PNG when you need lossless quality, transparency support, or crisp edges for text and graphics. Choose JPG when smaller file size is more important.
faq.a3: Yes, conversion happens instantly in your browser. Even large images are typically converted in under 2 seconds with no server upload needed.

heic-to-jpg.title: Convert HEIC to JPG Online Free
heic-to-jpg.description: Convert iPhone HEIC photos to JPG format for free. Universal compatibility with all devices and platforms. No signup, instant browser conversion.
heic-to-jpg.content: HEIC (High Efficiency Image Container) is the default photo format on iPhones and iPads since iOS 11. While HEIC offers superior compression, many Windows PCs, Android devices, and web platforms can't open HEIC files. Our free converter transforms HEIC photos to universally compatible JPG format, preserving the original image quality. Perfect for sharing iPhone photos with non-Apple users or uploading to websites that don't accept HEIC.
heic-to-jpg.howToTitle: How to Convert HEIC to JPG
heic-to-jpg.readyTitle: Ready to Convert HEIC to JPG?
heic-to-jpg.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
heic-to-jpg.step1: Upload your HEIC photo(s) from iPhone/iPad
heic-to-jpg.step2: The converter decodes and converts to JPG

faq.q1: Why can't I open HEIC files on Windows?
faq.a1: HEIC is an Apple format. Windows requires a paid codec from the Microsoft Store, or you can use our free converter to change HEIC to the universally supported JPG format.
faq.q2: Will EXIF data (location, date) be preserved?
faq.a2: Yes, our converter preserves EXIF metadata including camera settings, GPS location, and date/time information in the converted JPG file.
faq.q3: Can I convert Live Photos or HEIC videos?
faq.a3: Our converter handles HEIC still images. Live Photos contain both an image and video — the converter will extract and convert the still image portion to JPG.

svg-to-png.title: Convert SVG to PNG Online Free
svg-to-png.description: Convert SVG vector graphics to PNG raster images for free. Choose custom dimensions. No signup, browser-based conversion.
svg-to-png.content: Convert scalable SVG vector graphics to PNG raster images at any resolution. While SVG is perfect for web development and scalable logos, many applications require raster formats like PNG. Our converter renders your SVG at the exact dimensions you specify, producing crisp, high-quality PNG output with transparency support. Ideal for creating social media assets, app icons, or print-ready graphics from SVG source files.
svg-to-png.howToTitle: How to Convert SVG to PNG
svg-to-png.readyTitle: Ready to Convert SVG to PNG?
svg-to-png.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.

faq.q1: Can I choose the output resolution?
faq.a1: Yes, you can specify custom width and height in pixels. The SVG will be rendered at your chosen dimensions, maintaining vector crispness.
faq.a2: Yes, if your SVG has transparent areas, they will remain transparent in the PNG output. PNG fully supports alpha channel transparency.
faq.a3: Some platforms, email clients, and social media sites don't support SVG. PNG gives you a universally compatible raster image while maintaining visual quality.

video-to-gif.title: Convert Video to GIF Online Free
video-to-gif.description: Create animated GIFs from any video file for free. Trim, resize, and adjust frame rate. No signup, browser-based processing.
video-to-gif.content: Turn any video clip into a shareable animated GIF. Our free converter lets you select the exact portion of video to convert, adjust the frame rate for smooth animation, and resize the output for optimal file size. Perfect for creating reaction GIFs, social media content, tutorials, and memes. The converter handles MP4, WebM, and MOV files, processing everything locally in your browser for instant results.
video-to-gif.howToTitle: How to Convert Video to GIF
video-to-gif.readyTitle: Ready to Convert Video to GIF?
video-to-gif.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
video-to-gif.step1: Upload your video file (MP4, WebM, MOV)
video-to-gif.step2: Select the clip range and adjust settings

faq.q1: How do I keep the GIF file size small?
faq.a1: Reduce the frame rate (10-15 FPS is usually smooth enough), shorten the clip duration, and reduce the output dimensions. A 5-second, 480px wide GIF at 10 FPS is typically under 2MB.
faq.q2: What's the maximum video length for GIF conversion?
faq.a2: There's no hard limit, but GIFs are best for short clips (3-15 seconds). Longer clips produce very large files because GIF compression is less efficient than video codecs.
faq.q3: Can I add text or captions to the GIF?
faq.a3: The current converter creates GIFs from video frames directly. For adding text overlays, use our Image Editor tool after converting to GIF.

video-to-mp3.title: Extract Audio from Video — Video to MP3 Free
video-to-mp3.description: Extract MP3 audio from any video file for free. Convert MP4, WebM, MOV to MP3. No signup, instant browser-based extraction.
video-to-mp3.content: Extract the audio track from any video file and save it as an MP3. Perfect for saving music from video clips, extracting podcast audio from video recordings, or creating audio versions of lectures and tutorials. Our converter supports all major video formats including MP4, WebM, and MOV. You can trim the audio to extract only the portion you need, and choose the output bitrate for the perfect balance of quality and file size.
video-to-mp3.howToTitle: How to Convert Video to MP3
video-to-mp3.readyTitle: Ready to Convert Video to MP3?
video-to-mp3.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.

faq.q1: What audio quality can I expect?
faq.a1: The output quality depends on the original video's audio track. You can choose bitrates from 128kbps to 320kbps. 192kbps offers a good balance of quality and file size.
faq.q2: Can I extract only part of the audio?
faq.a2: Yes, use the trim feature to set start and end points. This lets you extract specific segments without downloading the entire audio track.
faq.q3: Does it work with YouTube videos?
faq.a3: This tool converts video files from your device. To work with YouTube content, first download the video using our YouTube tools, then extract the audio here.

compress-pdf.title: Compress PDF Online Free — Reduce PDF File Size
compress-pdf.description: Compress PDF files up to 80% smaller without losing quality. Free online PDF compressor. No signup, browser-based processing.
compress-pdf.content: Reduce your PDF file size by up to 80% while maintaining readable quality. Our intelligent compression algorithm optimizes images, removes redundant data, and streamlines the document structure. Perfect for email attachments (under 25MB), web uploads, and archival storage. Choose from three compression levels: light (minimal quality loss), recommended (best balance), or maximum (smallest file size). All processing happens in your browser — your documents never leave your device.
compress-pdf.cta: Convert PDF to Compressed PDF Now
compress-pdf.ctaBottom: Open PDF to Compressed PDF Converter
compress-pdf.howToTitle: How to Convert PDF to Compressed PDF
compress-pdf.readyTitle: Ready to Convert PDF to Compressed PDF?
compress-pdf.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.

faq.q1: How much can I reduce PDF file size?
faq.a1: Typical compression reduces file size by 40-80% depending on content. PDFs with many images compress the most. Text-heavy PDFs with few images may see 20-40% reduction.
faq.q2: Will text quality be affected by compression?
faq.a2: No, text remains crisp and fully searchable after compression. Only embedded images are recompressed, and at recommended settings the visual difference is imperceptible.
faq.q3: Can I compress multiple PDFs at once?
faq.a3: Currently the tool handles one PDF at a time. Upload, compress, download, then repeat for additional files. Each compression typically takes just a few seconds.

jpg-to-webp.title: Convert JPG to WebP Online Free
jpg-to-webp.description: Convert JPG images to WebP format for 30% smaller files with same quality. Free, no signup, instant browser-based conversion.
jpg-to-webp.content: WebP is Google's modern image format that delivers 25-34% smaller file sizes compared to JPG at equivalent quality. Converting your JPG images to WebP is essential for web performance — faster page loads, better Core Web Vitals scores, and lower bandwidth costs. Our converter produces high-quality WebP output while dramatically reducing file size. All modern browsers support WebP, making it the ideal format for web images.
jpg-to-webp.howToTitle: How to Convert JPG to WebP
jpg-to-webp.readyTitle: Ready to Convert JPG to WebP?
jpg-to-webp.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.

faq.q1: How much smaller will WebP files be compared to JPG?
faq.a1: WebP typically produces files 25-34% smaller than equivalent-quality JPGs. A 1MB JPG photo might become 650-750KB as WebP with no visible quality difference.
faq.a2: Yes, all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge support WebP. Only Internet Explorer (discontinued) lacks WebP support.
faq.q3: Should I replace all my JPGs with WebP?
faq.a3: For web use, yes — WebP offers better compression. For archival or print, keep JPGs as they have broader software support outside web browsers.

png-to-webp.title: Convert PNG to WebP Online Free
png-to-webp.description: Convert PNG images to WebP for dramatically smaller files with transparency support. Free, instant, browser-based conversion.
png-to-webp.content: WebP supports both lossy and lossless compression with full transparency — making it a superior replacement for PNG on the web. Converting PNG to WebP can reduce file sizes by 26-34% for lossless and up to 80% for lossy compression, while maintaining transparency. This is a game-changer for web performance, especially for sites with many transparent graphics, icons, and UI elements.
png-to-webp.howToTitle: How to Convert PNG to WebP
png-to-webp.readyTitle: Ready to Convert PNG to WebP?
png-to-webp.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.
png-to-webp.step2: Choose lossless or lossy WebP compression

faq.q1: Will transparency be preserved in WebP?
faq.a1: Yes, WebP fully supports alpha channel transparency, just like PNG. Your transparent backgrounds, overlays, and cutout images will look identical.
faq.q2: What's the difference between lossy and lossless WebP?
faq.a2: Lossless WebP preserves every pixel perfectly (like PNG) with ~26% size reduction. Lossy WebP can reduce size by up to 80% with minor visual differences.
faq.q3: Is WebP good for logos and icons?
faq.a3: Yes, lossless WebP is excellent for logos, icons, and graphics — maintaining crisp edges and transparency while being smaller than PNG.

compress-image.title: Compress Images Online Free — Reduce Image File Size
compress-image.description: Compress JPG, PNG, and WebP images up to 80% smaller. Free online image compressor. No signup, instant browser-based compression.
compress-image.content: Reduce image file sizes dramatically without visible quality loss. Our smart compressor uses advanced algorithms to optimize JPG, PNG, and WebP images for web, email, and storage. Perfect for website optimization, faster page loads, and reducing bandwidth costs. The compressor analyzes each image individually and applies the optimal compression strategy — preserving visual quality where it matters most while aggressively reducing file size in less important areas.

compress-image.ctaBottom: Open Image to Compressed Image Converter

compress-image.step1: Upload your image(s) — JPG, PNG, or WebP

faq.q1: How much can images be compressed?
faq.a1: Typical compression reduces file size by 40-80%. Photos with lots of detail compress well. Images already optimized for web may see smaller reductions of 10-20%.
faq.q2: Can I compress multiple images at once?
faq.a2: Yes, our batch compressor handles multiple images simultaneously. Upload all your files and compress them in one operation.
faq.a3: WebP offers the best compression ratios, followed by JPG. PNG compresses well for graphics but less for photos. Consider converting photos to WebP for best results.

pdf-to-text.title: Extract Text from PDF Online Free
pdf-to-text.description: Extract all text from PDF files for free. Copy, edit, and reuse PDF text content. No signup, instant browser-based extraction.
pdf-to-text.content: Extract all text content from any PDF document in seconds. Our tool handles both text-based PDFs and scanned documents (using OCR). The extracted text maintains paragraph structure and reading order, making it ready for editing, analysis, or reuse. Perfect for researchers extracting quotes, developers processing document content, and anyone who needs to copy text from a non-editable PDF.

pdf-to-text.readyTitle: Ready to Convert PDF to Text?
pdf-to-text.readySubtitle: Free, fast, and private. No signup required.

faq.q1: Can it extract text from scanned PDFs?
faq.a1: Yes, our tool includes OCR that recognizes text in scanned documents and images within PDFs. Results are best with clear, high-resolution scans.
faq.q2: Does it preserve the text formatting?
faq.a2: The tool extracts plain text content with paragraph breaks. Rich formatting like bold, italic, and colors are not preserved in the text output.
faq.q3: What languages are supported for text extraction?
faq.a3: The tool supports text extraction from PDFs in all languages that use Latin, Cyrillic, Greek, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean characters.
